long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Arvin introduces a revolutionary new UI that allows you to use OpenAIâ€™s ChatGPT on all your favorite sites such as Google Search, Gmail, LinkedIn, Github, and more. With this UI, you can search and write online with ease!

Hereâ€™s how it works:
- Simply Click âŒ¥ /alt + A to use OpenAI GPT on any website
- Chat with Arvin, your AI assistant that's always improving
- Why not type a slash â€œ/â€ and see what happens?

1. With Arvin, you can easily write professional email replies. 

All you have to do is provide a prompt that describes the context of the email and the kind of response you're looking for. Arvin will then analyze your prompt and suggest words and phrases that fit with the desired tone and content.

2. Arvin can summarize your content on any website.

Just give it the full text of your content and it will generate a summary that reflects the main points and key details. Arvin will analyze the text and come up with a summary that captures the essence of the content.

3. â€˜New wayâ€™ to use ChatGPT, Slash Commands.

We are working on making usage easier and safer.  Previously, users had to communicate with ChatGPT by sending a message for it to perform an action.  Now, the new approach involves typing a slash symbol "/" to access a menu of available prompts within the server. We love using them, and we know you who are using them already do, too!

4.  Whatâ€™s New : Chat with Arvin

Arvin is now equipped to have a friendly chat with you, just like a real human. You can ask him any question, tell him your problems, or just chat about your day. What's more, Arvin is constantly learning from your conversations to optimize his answers and responses. You can help him get smarter and more human-like by chatting with him regularly. With this new feature, Arvin is not just a chatbot anymore; he's your virtual friend that you can talk to whenever you need someone to listen. So why not give Arvin a try and experience the joy of chatting with an AI chatbot that's always learning and improving? Start chatting with Arvin today and see how he can enhance your day-to-day conversations.

5. Save & Reuse Prompts

Arvin doesn't just summarize your content, it also provides a convenient function to save prompts and suggested prompts.  This feature allows users to easily save and reuse frequently used prompts, as well as suggested prompts, streamlining their content creation process and enhancing efficiency.

Website: tryarvin.com

-What is chatgpt?

ChatGPT is an advanced language model developed by OpenAI based on the GPT (Generative Pre-Training Transformer) architecture. It is trained on a massive amount of text data from the web, and so is able to understand and respond to user input in a conversational manner. This makes it a great choice for use in chatbot and virtual assistant applications, and it can be used for a variety of natural language processing tasks such as language translation, text summarization, text generation, and answering questions.

-Troubleshooting

If you have any difficulties reach out to developer@idealabs.mobi
long.en,en_AU,zh_CN,zh_TW:
Arvin introduces a revolutionary new UI that allows you to use OpenAI's ChatGPT on all your favorite sites such as Google Search, Gmail, LinkedIn, Github, and more. With this UI, you can search and write online with ease! ğŸ˜„

Arvin keeps improving to bring you an exceptional experience. ğŸš€ By continuously optimizing the code interpreter, Arvin enables seamless debugging and rapid prototyping. âš¡ï¸ Furthermore, using the web summarizer feature, you can easily summarize page content. ğŸ“ What's more, get intelligent responses based on any uploaded PDFs. ğŸ“„ Additionally, Arvin enhances web access for your maximum convenience. ğŸŒ

Here's how it works:
Simply Click âŒ¥ /alt + A to use OpenAI GPT on any website ğŸ’¡
Chat with Arvin, your AI assistant who's always improving ğŸ’ª

1. With Arvin, you can easily write professional email replies. ğŸ“§
All you have to do is provide a prompt describing the email's context and the kind of response you're looking for. Arvin will then analyze your prompt and suggest words and phrases that fit with the desired tone and content. ğŸ‘

2. Arvin can summarize your content on any website. ğŸ“
Just give it the full text of your content and it will generate a summary that reflects the main points and key details. Arvin will analyze the text and come up with a summary that captures the essence of the content.ğŸ”

3. Quick Actions let you instantly translate, paraphrase, or explain text selections. âš¡ï¸
With Arvin's Quick Actions, you can select any text on a webpage and instantly get AI-powered translations, paraphrasing, or explanations.
